# Steamworks SDK

## Download Options

### Option 1: Official (Requires Steam Partner Account)
1. Visit: https://partner.steamgames.com/doc/sdk
2. Download the SDK
3. Extract contents here

### Option 2: GitHub Mirrors (Unofficial)
- https://github.com/rlabrecque/SteamworksSDK
- https://github.com/Facepunch/steamworks

## After Extraction

Bakery will automatically:
- Embed SDK binaries into executables (Windows/Linux)
- Copy SDK binaries to .app bundle (macOS)
- Link SDK automatically when steamworks.enabled: true
